title: Destructive command guard - pattern match dangerous commands (rm -rf, git reset --hard, DROP TABLE), detect heredoc scripts, block/warn based on mode

logs.msg: Implemented guard.rs with pattern matching for: rm -rf, git reset --hard, git push --force main, git clean -f, git checkout/restore ., SQL DROP/TRUNCATE/DELETE, chmod 777, device writes, mkfs, curl|bash. Bash tool now blocks destructive commands with explanation. 9 tests added, 322 total passing.
